metadata.sousChapitre: Nombres premiers, nombres premiers entre eux

value.latex:
Soient $a_1, \dots, a_n \in \N^{*}$ et $b_i = \prod_{j \ne i} a_j$.

Montrer que : \\$\text{pgcd}( a_1, \dots, a_n ) \times \text{ppcm}( b_1, \dots, b_n) =
       \text{ppcm}( a_1, \dots, a_n ) \times \text{pgcd}( b_1, \dots, b_n) =
       \prod a_i$.
value.html:
Soient \(a_1, \dots, a_n \in \N^{*}\) et \(b_i = \prod_{j \ne i} a_j\).

Montrer que :
\(\text{pgcd}( a_1, \dots, a_n ) \times \text{ppcm}( b_1, \dots, b_n) = \text{ppcm}( a_1, \dots, a_n ) \times \text{pgcd}( b_1, \dots, b_n) = \prod a_i\).
